text: Bimmen is a hamlet in the German municipality of Kleve, North Rhine- Westphalia. Bimmen is low-lying. It borders on the Netherlands in the west and on the Rhine River in the north. About 170 people are living there. The Klever Stra√üe is connecting Bimmen with neighbouring Dutch village of Millingen aan de Rijn. == Other websites == * Bimmen on the Kleve Website Category:Villages in North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Bimmen
